    • Method Detail

      • getTables

        @GET
 @Path(value="/gettables/{database_id}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String getTables(@PathParam(value="database_id")
                                                                                                                        int targetDatabaseId)
                                                                                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns JSON with table names based on target database ID given with the GET request. Database ID is based on the path parameter after /restservices/gettables/. Calls ConnectionController to get a list of table names, then adds these into a JSON array with a lambda loop. JSON format is: { tables:[ {name: "tablename"} ] }
        Parameters:
        targetDatabaseId -
        Returns:
        JSON
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getColumns

        @GET
 @Path(value="/gettablecolumns/{database_id}/{tablename}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String getColumns(@PathParam(value="database_id")
                                                                                                                                           int targetDatabaseId,
                                                                                                                                           @PathParam(value="tablename")
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String tableName)
                                                                                                                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns JSON with column names based on target database ID and tablename given with the GET request. Calls ConnectionController to get a list of column names, then adds these into a JSON array with a lambda loop. JSON format is: { columns:[ {name: "columnname"} ] } Database ID is based on the path parameter after /restservices/gettables/. Tablename is based on the path parameter after /restservices/gettablecolumn/databaseid/
        Parameters:
        targetDatabaseId -
        tableName -
        Returns:
        JSON
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • generateCode

        @POST
 @Path(value="/generatecode/{businessrule_id}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String generateCode(@PathParam(value="businessrule_id")
                                                                                                                                   int businessRuleId)
                                                                                                                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns JSON with true or false, this represents if the code has been generated based on the BusinessRule object. Creates a GeneratedCode object with the same ID as businessRuleId, with code generated at Generator.java class. It then gets status = 0 due to the generated code not yet being inserted into the target database. JSON Format is: {status: "false"/"true"} businessrule_id is based on the path parameter after /restservices/generatecode/
        Parameters:
        businessRuleId -
        Returns:
        JSON
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • insertCode

        @POST
 @Path(value="/insertcode/{generatedcode_id}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String insertCode(@PathParam(value="generatedcode_id")
                                                                                                                                int generatedCodeId)
                                                                                                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns JSON with true or false, this represents if the code has been inserted based on the GeneratedCode object. Inserts the GeneratedCode object with the given ID into the target database using ConnectionController.insertCode. The GeneratedCode object then gets status = 1 due to the generated code being inserted into the target database. JSON Format is: {status: "false"/"true"} generatedcode_id is based on the path parameter after /restservices/insertcode/
        Parameters:
        generatedCodeId -
        Returns:
        JSON
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
